landingPage.introTextBottom: to start your business in Berlin?
landingPage.outtroTextBottom: But we’ll make it less painful
landingPage.oddOfficeShortDescBottom: — with bold concepts, sharp visuals, and the paperwork magic you didn’t know you needed.

projectsList.title: Sword Master Noodle
projectsList.subTitle: Korean Noodle Restaurant
projectsList.projectText: A restaurant designed to showcase the process of making Kalguksu as a performance while creating a seamless flow where diners can visually appreciate the preparation and savor the dish at their table.

projectsList.title: odd cafe
projectsList.subTitle: Café
projectsList.projectText: A café built on the unique sense of comfort found in odd harmony. Featuring an unexpected pairing of desserts by a Serbian baker and coffee brewed by a Korean barista in Berlin. A space where aged materials are reassembled and transformed into furniture and lighting, creating a strangely balanced atmosphere.

projectsList.title: Lia Ppang
projectsList.subTitle: Korean Dessert Café
projectsList.projectText: This project aimed to create a flexible atmosphere where the personality of Lia, the founder of Lia Ppang Café, could naturally blend into the space. What once served as a chicken restaurant storage was transformed into a café with a fresh and distinctive character.

projectsList.title: GoGogi
projectsList.subTitle: Korean Dining Restaurant
projectsList.projectText: Gogogi was founded through the collaboration of three creatives from Korea: an electronic musician, a fashion stylist, and an interior designer. The concept was not to create a simple dining space serving Korean food, but rather to establish an experiential space where food, aroma, spatial design, and music come together in harmony.

consultingSteps.title: 10. Grand Opening
consultingSteps.description:
- Launch event & promotional campaign
- Performance monitoring during the first month

consultingSteps.title: 9. System Setup
consultingSteps.description:
- Supplier selection & contract for food & beverages
- Partnership with delivery platforms (Wolt, Lieferando, Uber Eats)
- POS, reservation, and payment system integration

consultingSteps.title: 8. Staff Recruitment & Training
consultingSteps.description:
- Hiring key personnel (chefs, kitchen staff, service team)
- Hygiene & safety training
- Service and operations manual training

consultingSteps.title: 7. Online Marketing
consultingSteps.description:
- Marketing strategy & promotion planning
- Professional photos & videos showcasing brand story
- Optimized website development
- Social media & promotional channel management

consultingSteps.title: 6. Construction & Installation
consultingSteps.description:
- Interior construction
- Kitchen equipment & furniture installation
- Contractor selection & project management
- Final touch-ups and finishing details

consultingSteps.title: 5. Interior Design
consultingSteps.description:
- Concept development & space planning
- Electrical & facility layout planning
- Architectural blueprint preparation
- Furniture & lighting design

consultingSteps.title: 4. Branding
consultingSteps.description:
- Visual identity design
- Logo, signage, menu, and packaging design

consultingSteps.title: 3. Legal Permits
consultingSteps.description:
- Company formation (UG, GmbH)
- Business registration (Gewerbeanmeldung)
- Liquor license (Gaststättenerlaubnis)
- Health department approval

consultingSteps.title: 2. Location Selection
consultingSteps.description:
- Local market & commercial district analysis
- Property condition & zoning verification
- Lease negotiation

consultingSteps.title: 1. Business Plan
consultingSteps.description:
- Target audience analysis & market research
- Menu concept & pricing strategy
- Budgeting, investment, and revenue forecast
- Business plan for official submission

aboutUsPage.descTop: a Berlin-based studio offering business consulting and interior design.
aboutUsPage.descBottom: With deep experience in launching and running F&B ventures — from branding to build-out — we bring your ideas to life in spaces that work and inspire.

privacyPolicyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicyPage.responsibleEntityText:
Responsible for data processing on this website is:
odd office GbR
Zelterstr. 6, 10439 Berlin Germany
Email: odd.office.ber@gmail.com
privacyPolicyPage.dataCollectionText: We collect personal information (name, email, phone number) provided voluntarily through our contact form, emails, or calls, solely to offer our consulting services.
privacyPolicyPage.hostingText:
Our website is hosted by Vercel Inc., and we use Firebase (Google) for user authentication, storage, and basic analytics.

Firebase's Privacy Policy: https://firebase.google.com/support/privacy
Vercel's Privacy Policy: https://vercel.com/legal/privacy-policy
privacyPolicyPage.cookiesText: We use essential cookies required for the basic functions of our website and Firebase analytics to understand basic user interactions. You can manage cookie settings in your browser settings.
privacyPolicyPage.dataStorageText: Your data is securely stored on Firebase servers located in Europe or the USA, complying with GDPR requirements. We use security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access.
privacyPolicyPage.yourRightsText:
Right of access, rectification, and erasure of personal data.
Right to restriction of processing and data portability.
Right to withdraw consent at any time.
For any privacy concerns or exercising your rights, please contact us at odd.office.ber@gmail.com
